comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Wow. What a gusher. Surely this is actually the Charleville bore, in Queensland? Check out this photo and read description when you click through to teh Queensland library: nla.gov.au/nla.cs-pa-http%3A%2F%2Fenc.slq.qld.gov.au%2Flo...

comment.author: 47572660@N08
comment._content: Wow, 3,000,000 gallons daily is quite a lot of water! It must have been interesting, building the shed around it.............
